flawed_nl_solution:
In the first round, Richard knocked down 70 + 15 = <<70+15=85>>85 pins.
In the second round, Patrick knocked down 85 x 2 = <<85*2=170>>170 pins.
In the second round, Richard knocked down 170 - 3 = <<170-3=164>>164 pins.
In total, Patrick knocked down 70 + 170 = <<70+170=240>>240 pins
In total, Richard knocked down 85 + 164 = <<85+164=249>>249 pins
Richard knocked down 249 - 240 = <<249-240=9>>9 pins more than Patrick.
